name: Addicat
description:
Pablo is a sweet cat addicted to drugs who's on the run from a Dog.

The objective is to dodge the obstacles that get in your way and collect pills in order to keep your drug level (represented by the bar on the top of the game screen) high.

The bar has a sweet-spot, hit it and you get high, but be careful:

  • Go beyond the sweet-spot and you overdose resulting in gameover
  • Let it empty and you'll get cold turkey and lose

When you get high Pablo gets a speed boost to avoid the Dog, take too long and you'll get caught.

Controls
up arrow – Jump
down arrow – Slide
P – Restart game

Dev Note: this was a first semestre project so feedback is more than welcome, feel free to report problems you might find :)
